title: NIKE Air Stab Mens Running Shoes
summary: Nike updates a classic running sneaker with retro colors and sporty style. Features leather construction, slightly padded footbed, and true-to-size fit.

title: New Balance - Men's M1122 - Series 1122 - Color M1122MC White/Navy
summary: Men's motion control running shoe for runners needing maximum support and cushioning, featuring Abzorb SBS for shock absorption and Rollbar for rearfoot stability.

summary: Cozy men's sheepskin moccasin with padded insole and suede sole stitching for ultimate comfort and warmth.

title: La Sportiva Trango S Evo GTX Mountaineering Boot - Men's
summary: Waterproof Vibram Mulaz crampon-compatible alpine boots featuring a 3D ankle-hinge for front-pointing and side-to-side flexibility, Cordura uppers and Gore-Tex lining for protection and dryness, and a 7 mm Trailflex midsole for cushioning and stability.

title: STACY ADAMS Gavin Slip-Ons
summary: Slip-on loafer with leather and synthetic upper, perforated vamp, leather vamp strap, leather lining and insole, and synthetic outsole.

title: NIKE Fingertrap Max Mens Cross Training Shoes 644673-010 Reflect Silver 10.5 M US
summary: Nike Fingertrap Max training shoe: Interwoven upper for maximum protection and fit; Nike air unit for impact absorption; Advanced flex groove outsole for natural foot movement; Synthetic and mesh material; Full-length inner sleeve for support; Seamless overlays reduce irritation.

The full-grain leather upper, padded collar and tongue, and removable footbed offer additional comfort.

summary: Classic Clarks chukka boot with center stitch seam, suede leather construction, roomy toe box, and crepe outsole for shock absorption and foot comfort.

title: CLARKS Men's Wallabee Boot
summary: Suede Clarks Wallabee boots feature welted edges, lace-up front, and a gum sole. Made from 100% leather, they have a crepe sole, cowhide construction, and measure 11 x 4 x 7 inches with a 4.5-inch shaft height and a 0.75-inch platform, weighing 3 pounds.
